Package ipp.estg.database.repositories.interfaces

Interface IUserRepository

All Superinterfaces:
IRepository<User>
All Known Implementing Classes:
UserRepository
public interface IUserRepository extends IRepository<User>
Interface for the UserRepository which extends the generic IRepository interface. Provides methods for user-specific operations such as login, user management, and approval.

  • Method Details

    • login

      User login(String email, String password)
      Allows a user to log in by providing their email and password.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the user.
      password - The password of the user.
      Returns:
      The user corresponding to the provided email and password.

    • add

      boolean add(String username, String email, String password, UserTypes userType) throws CannotWritetoFileException
      Adds a new user to the repository.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user.
      email - The email of the user.
      password - The password of the user.
      userType - The type of user (e.g., admin, regular).
      Returns:
      True if the user is added successfully, otherwise false.
      Throws:
      CannotWritetoFileException - if there is an error while writing to the file or database.

    • update

      void update(User userToApprove) throws CannotWritetoFileException
      Updates the status of a user (e.g., approval of a user).
      Parameters:
      userToApprove - The user to be updated.
      Throws:
      CannotWritetoFileException - if there is an error while writing to the file or database.

    • getByEmail

      User getByEmail(String userEmail)
      Retrieves a user by their email address.
      Parameters:
      userEmail - The email address of the user.
      Returns:
      The user corresponding to the provided email.

    • getPendingUsers

      List<User> getPendingUsers(UserTypes userType)
      Retrieves a list of users that are pending approval, based on user type.
      Parameters:
      userType - The type of user to filter (e.g., admin, regular).
      Returns:
      A list of users pending approval.
